Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.usp_Services_ListByStatus @Status TINYINT = 1 AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE dbo.Services SET GroupId = @GroupId, Name = @Name, Description = @Description, Url = @Url, Params = @Params, ResponseCode = @ResponseCode, UpdatedTime = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET(), Enable = @Enable, Status = @Status WHERE Id = @Id; END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.usp_Services_Update @Id INT, @GroupId INT, @Name VARCHAR(100), @Description VARCHAR(500), @Url VARCHAR(500), @Params VARCHAR(500), @ResponseCode VARCHAR(100), @Enable TINYINT, @Status TINYINT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: UPDATE dbo.Services SET Status = @Status, UpdatedTime = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() WHERE Id = @Id

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT dbo.ServicesLog (JournalGuid, ServiceId, ServiceUrl, ServiceStatus) VALUES (@JournalGuid, @ServiceId, @ServiceUrl, @ServiceStatus)

BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_Users_Delete] @Id INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT u.Id, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email, ul.UserName, ul.Password, u.STATUS, u.CreatedTime, u.UpdatedTime FROM dbo.Users u LEFT JOIN dbo.UsersLogin ul ON u.Id = ul.Id WHERE u.Id = @Id;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_Users_Get] @Id INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT u.Id, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email, ul.UserName, ul.Password, u.STATUS, u.CreatedTime, u.UpdatedTime FROM dbo.Users u LEFT JOIN dbo.UsersLogin ul ON u.Id = ul.Id;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_Users_List] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SET @ResponseCode = 1; IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.Users WHERE Email = @Email AND Id <> @Id ) BEGIN SET @ResponseCode = -1; -- email existed RETURN; END; IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.UsersLogin WHERE UserName = @UserName AND Id <> @Id ) BEGIN SET @ResponseCode = -2; -- username existed RETURN; END; UPDATE dbo.Users SET FirstName = @FirstName, LastName = @LastName, Email = @Email, UpdatedTime = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() WHERE Id = @Id; UPDATE dbo.UsersLogin SET UserName = @UserName, Password = (CASE WHEN LEN(@Password) > 0 THEN @Password ELSE Password END), UpdatedTime = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() WHERE Id = @Id; END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_Users_Update] @Id INT, @FirstName VARCHAR(50), @LastName VARCHAR(50), @Email VARCHAR(100), @UserName VARCHAR(50), @Password VARCHAR(100), @ResponseCode INT OUTPUT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: UPDATE dbo.Users SET STATUS = CASE WHEN STATUS = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, UpdatedTime = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET() WHERE Id = @Id;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_Users_UpdateStatus] @Id INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_UsersLogin_VerifyAuthentication] @UserName VARCHAR(50), @Password VARCHAR(100), @ResponseCode INT OUTPUT AS
